titles.title: He Who Began A Good Work In You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He who began a good work in you. (2x)
He will be faithful to complete it. (2x)
He who started the good work,
Will be faithful to complete it in you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If the struggle you're facing
Is slowly replacing your hope with despair.
For the process is long, and
You're losing your song in the night.
You can be sure that the Lord has His hand on you,
Safe and secure, He will never abandon you.
You are His treasure, and He has His pleasure in you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Aquel que la buena obra empezo.
Aquel que la buena obra empezo
Sera fiel en completarla.
El es fiel en compltarla.
El que la comenzo, sera fiel en completarla en ti.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Si la lucha que enfrentas lentamente te lleva a desesperar.
Si al durar el proceso y en la noche le dejas de alabar.
Debes saber, que Su mano El ha puesto en ti.
Salvo y seguro, El nunca te dejara.
